sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Senior Mobile Applications Engineer with 7+ years of experience architecting and delivering scalable Android apps (10M+ downloads). Proficient in Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, and Firebase, with expertise in performance optimization, Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, and modern Android frameworks. Proven leader in driving architectural enhancements, accelerating delivery, and building high-performing teams, with React Native as a secondary skill for cross-platform development.

achievements: Implemented architectural improvements that enhanced engineering velocity.
Led end-to-end feature development ensuring consistent, timely product releases
Collaborated cross-functionally with product teams to deliver user-centric solutions
Successfully migrated legacy Java application to React Native for cross-platform delivery
Served as Android Technical Lead for geofencing-enabled events application
Enhanced app architecture with Room database and MVVM pattern for offline capabilities
Led Android development team (2-3 engineers) delivering client solutions
Managed complete project lifecycle from architecture design to production deployment
Designed scalable Android applications with modern architecture patterns
Mentored junior developers and managed Play Store & Amazon App Store releases
Developed and maintained consumer applications achieving 10M+ downloads
Recognized as Employee of the Quarter (2018) for exceptional performance
Progressed from intern to developer, designing commercial Android applications

items.name: Smart Transfer
items.description: Smart Transfer is a high-performance file sharing app with 10M+ downloads. It enables fast data transfer via Wi-Fi and hotspot, phone cloning, and internet-based sharing, while also offering productivity tools like bookmarks, storage and contacts clutter manager, and device stats (Wi-Fi and battery)

items.name: UNATION Events
items.description: Location-based event discovery platform with advanced geofencing, MVVM architecture, REST API integration, and Kotlin Coroutines

items.name: Logo Maker Pro
items.description: Creative design tool with 10M+ downloads, featuring Canvas drawing engine and AWS cloud integration for professional logo creation
